verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:16
verses.text: And the Philistine drew near morning and evening, and presented himself forty days.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:17
verses.text: And Jesse said unto David his son, Take now for thy brethren an ephah of this parched corn, and these ten loaves, and run to the camp to thy brethren;

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:18
verses.text: And carry these ten cheeses unto the captain of their thousand, and look how thy brethren fare, and take their pledge.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 17:19
verses.text: Now Saul, and they, and all the men of Israel, were in the valley of Elah, fighting with the Philistines.
